prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Jorge Luis Borges, El Muerto, n.d., Accession #10155-o, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This manuscript was purchased by the Library from Christie, Manson & Woods Ltd. in St. James, London, England.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This thirteen-page autograph manuscript, "El Muerto," by Jorge Luis Borges, is a short story which was published in his El Aleph.Written on graph paper of varied cut sizes with paper covers, it includes extensive revisions in the form of line throughs.
